item.title: Michigan Townspeople Move 9,100 Books To New Home One By One
item.description: About 300 Chelsea residents made themselves handy on Sunday by helping a book store move its inventory to a new location one block away.

item.title: Tortoise Lost In Mississippi Tornado Finds Its Way Back To Family Weeks Later
item.description: “It feels good to kind of have some kind of happy out of so much sad and grief and loss," said Myrtle's grateful owner, Tiffany Emanuel.
